lead_paragraph: Professor Maddison, a British-born economic historian with a compulsion for quantification, spent many years calculating the size of economies over the last three millenniums.
snippet: Professor Maddison, a British-born economic historian with a compulsion for quantification, spent many years calculating the size of economies over the last three millenniums.

headline.main: Angus Maddison, Economic Historian, Dies at 83
headline.seo: Angus Maddison, Economic Historian, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Angus Maddison, 83, Who Quantified Ancient Economies
